summary: Tested Login/Register pages UI and the CRITICAL 'Login fails after logout' bug. All tests PASSED. The recurring bug was NOT REPRODUCED - login -> logout -> login flow works correctly.

minor.issue: Backend does not validate password minimum length (6 chars) - validation only on frontend

console_warnings.issue: React key warning: 'Encountered two children with the same key' for ID aa519114-0295-4856-9406-30f2f5853610

action_items: OPTIONAL: Add backend password length validation in /api/auth/register endpoint
OPTIONAL: Fix React duplicate key warning in sidebar/dashboard component
critical_code_review_comments: Login page UI renders correctly with all data-testid attributes present
Register page UI renders correctly with all data-testid attributes present
AuthContext.js logout function correctly clears token from localStorage and axios headers
Login -> Logout -> Login flow works correctly - no bug found
Form validation works on frontend (HTML5 validation + toast errors)
Forgot password modal opens and closes correctly
Navigation between Login <-> Register works correctly
Demo link navigates to /demo page correctly

demo_user.status: Login works but has subscription issues (see iteration_25)

seed_data_creation: Created test users during registration tests with unique emails
context_for_next_testing_agent: Login/Register pages have been redesigned and tested. The 'Login fails after logout' bug was NOT reproduced - the flow works correctly. All auth API endpoints tested and working. React key warning in console is minor and doesn't affect functionality.
